constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 152 (Wednesday, September 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMUCKER:
H.R. 8944.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 7 of Section 8 of Article 1 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H8066]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1 East Main Street in Mount Joy, Pennsylvania, as the "Harold Billow Post Office Building".
